thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Neng TYI Precision Industries sets subscription record date on Feb. 16 for new shares issuance

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Neng TYI Precision Industries sets subscription record date on Feb. 16 for new shares issuance

organizations.name: neng tyi precision industries co ltd

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Neng TYI Precision Industries Co Ltd :
* Says it plans to issue 12 million new shares of the company to raise fund for bank loan payment
* Subscription record date is Feb. 16
* Last date before book closure is Feb. 11
* Book closure period is from Feb. 12 to Feb. 16
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/g46gGK
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
